# Strategic Charge (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Blackguard Spells|Blackguard 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 210

*A red nimbus surrounds you as you move smoothly across the crowded battlefield.*

You gain the benefit of the [[Mobility (Feat)|Mobility]] feat, even if you not meet the prerequisites. You do not have to be charging to gain this benefit.
